article.headline: American U. 66, Lehigh 58
article.story: BETHLEHEM, Pa. -- Derrick Mercer scored 15 points and Garrison Carr added 14, leading American to a 66-58 victory over Lehigh on Saturday night. American (15-7, 7-1 Patriot League) led by four points at the half, held a 10-point lead with 10:29 remaining and survived a late rally that pulled Lehigh within three points in the final minute. Zahir Carrington had his seventh double-double of the season, finishing with 20 points and 12 rebounds for Lehigh (13-9, 3-5). Rob Keefer added 12 points. American's substitutes outscored their Lehigh counterparts 25-9, and the Mountain Hawks were slowed by 3-for-16 shooting from 3-point range.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
